name: 256 k
description:
A rather hard rhythm game - what level can you reach?
A developer challenge - what is the smallest possible app size?

Love rhythm games but hate them filling up your phone with their soundtracks? This is for you.

Features procedural art and music.

How to play:
• Tap the beat when a Plasma Ball aligns the Star
• On successful taps the Plasma Ball under the Star disappears and Glow Circles grow
• Level Up when both Glow Circles are full

Hints:
• Tap on the lower part of the screen to keep Star visible
• Eliminate all Plasma Balls
